ygData.subject: Rant and Ramble (long)
ygData.msgSnippet: There isn t a whole lot of activity on this list so I will just ramble and rant for a bit.  Feel free to delete this if you wish. Last night was kewl yet slow
ygData.messageBody:
There isn't a whole lot of activity on this list so I
will just ramble and rant for a bit. Feel free to
delete this if you wish.

Last night was kewl yet slow for Cronik. He only died
twice and that was not his fault, kind of. The first
time was against a yellow lesser mummy. I was really
kicking it into the negative plane when suddenly I start
getting nailed by 3 other skeles! I was not in the
aggro spawn range of the obilisk (I saw other skeles pop
and not attack me) so I guess someone was out matched
and trained me. That sucked since another person was
KSing from me for 30 minutes. I was getting really mad
since most of what I was attacking was green (yet giving
xp sometimes) and blue.
Then I see an auction for a Tentecle Whip for 25pp. Hot
dam! Now I have no idea what a TW is really worth, but
I jumped on it after seeing someone here (sorry forgot
your name) talk about using their whip and I am very
happy. :) Now I had been neglecting my 1HS since 4th
level, but had a 26 in it after training at the guild. I
went out and fought any blue creature I could find. Last
I remember my 1HS was at 40. I killed 2 wisps at yellow
and even. kewl!
While getting my 1HS up I was killing kodies. On a
yellow kodi it happened to be pretty even and was
hovering over my Harm Touch hotkey when 2 skeles start
helping out. Dam. I was not able to get any Mana
increasing items last night and did not have Invis
Undead up as a result. I would have lived if I had. :(
Last night ended with me 1/2 way to 10th. Probably
would be into 10th but kodies were not plentiful, and I
trained my 1HS before it got too far behind to train it
easy.

I also grouped with a 7th and an 8th DE trying to level
them up. They weren't used to grouping and they would
not say where they were/loc when not in sight or that
they were getting attacked or how much mana they had.
:( Luckily no one died.

I will not fight on a mountain top anymore. When a
creature runs and rondomly switches direction (on a
dime) and on mountains it sucks! Had a massive train
when it came back at 1/2 health!

While running around the entrance to EC from Neriak I
see a 6th level Paladin running around. WTF? I can see
a 18th level looking to pull a guard or two to the zone,
but a 6th level? Jeez. Never realized how easy it was to
just wander around Neriak as a goody race.

Anyone know what level Travis Two Tone is?
I want to try to take him out soon. :)
And those dam halflings! What level are they? The group
on the newbie side kicked my a$$ last weekend at blue.
Whirl for 22 points and thrown back like 15 feet!
Couldn't get in to Slam. Haven't been back since.

--
Cronik
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
9th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous

"Greenbloods jus be Froglok trick. Smash'm and dey
blood same color a Froglok. Me smash'm Greenblood
for Thule. Thule make Cronik big feared. Make
smash'm fun."
